findings.message: public/runtime-config.js is not present in the repo; HTML loads it so it must be generated for local dev or at deploy.
findings.recommended_fix: Run scripts/generate_runtime_config.py locally or ensure the deploy workflow writes public/runtime-config.js from SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_ANON_KEY secrets.

next_agent.name: frontend-ui-compiler
notes: runtime-config loader order verified across HTML entrypoints.
supabaseClient.js is the single client entrypoint and uses runtime-config values.
No unknown API endpoints detected against api_contract.json.
